remarks.format: ## Remarks Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [tipi semplici (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f387687-9372-49e9-8135-cc9650bfe539) e [tipi semplici (metadati)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ddf09722-81b5-451b-a086-1dcf25a4f7d4).For more information, see [Simple Types (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f387687-9372-49e9-8135-cc9650bfe539) and [Simple Types (Metadata)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ddf09722-81b5-451b-a086-1dcf25a4f7d4).
